column1: All right, you wanna thug with the Five Point Crips? Bitches, all you gotta do is pop some punk-ass Bloods.
Yo yo, listen up y'all! Let me tell you about my little Gs, Roller and 4 Legs here. They just smoked thirteen Bloods in one night!
That ain't never been done before!
You're not just in, you're the baddest mofo Crips in town! Cipac!  Turn up the beat so we can celebrate our new Gs Five-Points style!
Wait a minute. What did you say?
I guess we could at least give havin' fun together a try. It's like  Come on.
I've gotta give you two dawgs props for puttin' an end to all this hate.
